Package org.fosstrak.reader.rprm.core.msg

Interface Summary
IncomingMessageListener IncomingMessageListener is an interface that has to be implemented by all classes that are interested in the incoming messages.
MessageParser A MessageParser parses a messages into the intermediate representation (IR) used by the CommandDispatcher.
MessageSerializer A MessageSerializer serializes the intermediate representation (IR) of a Reply into a String message.
MessagingConstants Constant values used in the Reader Protocol.
NotificationListener NotificationListener is an interface that has to be implemented by all classes that are interested in the notification messages.
 

Class Summary
Address Implementation of addresses used in the EPC Message/Transport Bindings (MTB).
Clients Clients manages the inforamtion about registered clients.
CommandDispatcher The command dispatcher dispatches the commands by invoking the methods on the ReaderDevice and creates the response.
Context  
HttpReceiverHandshakeMessage Class used for handshaking.
HttpSenderHandshakeMessage Class used for handshaking.
IncomingMessage IncomingMessage holds connection and a message received through this connection.
IncomingMessageBuffer IncomingMessageBuffer is a buffer that stores IncomingMessage It is added to each client connection as a listener, so that it can be notified if there is a new message.
MessageDispatcher The ServiceDispatcher receives plain messages in XML or TEXT format from the IncomingMessageBuffer.
MessageFactory Singleton factory class which creates the concrete instances of a MessageParser and a MessageSerializer.
MessageFormat This is a helper class because there are no Enums in Java 1.4.
MessageLayer MessageLayer is the main class.
MessageLayerConfiguration Loads the configuration properties for the MessageLayer from the property file.
NotificationChannelConnections This class is used as a pool for notification channel connections.
OutgoingMessageBuffer OutgoingMessageBuffer is a buffer consisting of messages that has to be sent to a client (called "host" in the EPC Reader Protocol).
OutgoingMessageClient OutgoingMessageClient is a thread responsible to get a message from the OutgoingMessageBuffer and send it to the client using a corresponding * Connection.
OutgoingMessageDispatcher OutgoingMessageDispatcher sends a message to a given client (called "host" in the EPC Reader Protocol).
ReadReportNotificationListener Implementation of the interface NotificationListener.
ReceiverHandshakeMessage Class used for handshaking.
SenderHandshakeMessage Class used for handshaking.
TcpReceiverHandshakeMessage Class used for handshaking.
TcpSenderHandshakeMessage Class used for handshaking.
TextMessageParser The TextMessageParser parses incoming text-messages and tries to extract the information needed for a correct execution of the associated command.
TextMessageSerializer Serializes a JAXB object tree into a String using the text message format defined in the EPC Reader Protocol Specification.
XmlMessageParser The XmlMessageParser parses incoming xml-messages and tries to extract the information needed for a correct execution of the associated command.
XmlMessageSerializer The XmlMessageSerializer serializes an reply or notification object into an outgoing XML message.
 

Enum Summary
MessageLayer.AgentType The agent type enum
 

Exception Summary
MessageParsingException Exception which is thrown if the parsing could not be processed successfully.
MessageSerializingException Exception which is thrown if the serializing could not be processed successfully.
